description:
This low-profile pack can hook you up. It carries skis, a board, or snowshoes in comfort. For more technical terrain, strap on a pair of tools and a helmet. The suspension, custom-designed for the Targhee, is vertically stable yet allows the hip swivel you want for glorious downhill swoops.

  • HDPE framesheet with cross-stay and wire wishbone perimeter frame. Snow-shedding moulded back panel
  • Padded hipbelt and lumbar pad for optimal load transfer and comfort
  • Pocket and gear loop on hipbelt
  • Barn-door rear entry for full access to main compartment, with a bottom retention fence to prevent spillage
  • A-Frame carry fits skis up to 130mm in the tails and is offset to keep the ends away from your calves and head. Stowable diagonal ski carry system has a locking ski attachment
  • Stowable helmet carry with sculpted cutout for secure attachment
  • Ice axe carrier is made for modern tools
  • Dedicated tool pocket allows rapid access to your safety gear
  • Low profile, insulated hydration sleeve with easy entry port at shoulder
  • Padded front panel protects against sharp edges of skis, shovels and axes
  • Safety whistle on chest harness buckle
  • Snowplow buckles won’t freeze up or clog
name: Gregory Targhee 30 Backpack - Women's
